actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Local Public Works Capital Development and Investment Act of 1976 to permit priority consideration of applications from certain local governments.

summary.text: Amends the Local Public Works Capital Development and Investment Act of 1976 to give funding priority to any local government which applied for funds prior to enactment of this Act, and which did not receive a grant because of utilization of an incorrect unemployment rate in its application.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Local Public Works Capital Development and Investment Act of 1976 to permit priority consideration of applications from certain local governments.
